alert.note: Alert for Baca; Prowers (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 18 at 6:43PM MDT until May 18 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN PROWERS AND NORTHEASTERN BACA COUNTIES... At 643 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles north of The Saunders Elevator, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Prowers and northeastern Baca Counties. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
